title: Morning Joe 4/5/21
description: The Morning Joe panel reflects on Easter weekend, the anniversary of the death of Martin Luther King Jr., the return of Major League Baseball and Georgia's new voting law.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
